XI.iii.1.B.1.e
.
Service Department Certification of Active Federal Service
If the military service department certifies that there has been active Federal service, accept this as a basis for adjudicating benefits if the individual was, in fact, mustered into Federal service,
unless
there is evidence to the contrary.
